2 - Coloradans are already supportive of the defense and space missions. With over 50,000 jobs split between the public and private sectors, Colorado has the nation’s largest aerospace economy per capita.

1 - We’re not new to aerospace infrastructure - we’re proudly home to Buckley, Peterson, and Schriever Air Force Bases along with the Air Force’s Space Command - and can support sensitive facilities and communications systems.

“It is no coincidence that the largest freshman class since Watergate is also the class that is leading and pushing on this critical reform measure," freshman Rep. Jason Crow (D-Colo.) said at a Thursday news conference. #ForThePeople #HR1 https://www.politico.com/story/2019/03/08/house-passes-sweeping-election-reform-bill-1212693 …

We did it! I joined 233 of my colleagues today to pass sweeping reforms for the government in the For the People Act. --
   ✅ Protect your right to vote
   ✅ Get dark money out of politics
   ✅ Hold politicians accountable
Today’s the day! We’re voting on the biggest reforms since Watergate. Let’s kick big money out of politics and get our government working for the people again! #HR1 pic.twitter.com/f1IMF8VcCy
Great to join @Tiffany_Muller (from @StopBigMoney) and @RepTjCox as we get ready to vote on #HR1 the biggest reforms in decades to get dark money out of politics. pic.twitter.com/VbKhaMdSin
It’s not a question – let’s pass #HR1, end dark money, and make our democracy truly #ForThePeople! (6/6) pic.twitter.com/ZTlv4KMrj2
On top of all that, #ForThePeople will ensure greater access to the ballot box, prohibit voter roll purges, and end partisan gerrymandering. (5/6)

And it does so much more: It will bolster ethics laws -- closing loopholes on lobbyists and stopping members of Congress from settling sexual harassment or discrimination cases with taxpayer money. (4/6)
#HR1 helps closes that loophole and provides more transparency and accountability in our elections. (3/6)
Right now, mega-donors are allowed to give MILLIONS of dollars to secret dark money groups designed to sway our elections and never have to disclose their identity. That needs to change. (2/6)
Since the beginning, I have vowed to get dark money out of politics to make sure our government is for the people, by the people, and of the people... (1/6)
